original_title: Pan Asia ‘Ezy Banking’ spaces in branches to enhance customer digital experience
original_body_lines: Pan Asia Bank proudly launched its first Digital Banking Center to enable its customer base to access its banking services round the clock. The new state-of-the-art ‘Ezy Banking’ Center offers unprecedented freedom for Pan Asia Bank customers to conduct all their transactions under one roof digitally while also enjoying the familiarity of a branch location. Pan Asia bank will roll this EZY Banking spaces across its network to provide the convenience of this initiative to all customers around the nation.

Pan Asia Bank has selected the Pettah branch, the business hub in Sri Lanka to locate its first EZY Banking Center with the objective of empowering the business community and to provide best-in-class convenience to them.
